name: Data Engineer
description:
Impress is a European direct-to-consumer teeth-aligner and oral care startup. We provide an affordable and convenient way to straighten teeth with aligners treatment. Our long-term vision is to disrupt European conventional dentistry and orthodontia.

About position.

We in Impress are building the most modern data analytics stack. We use AWS for hosting, Airbyte and DBT for ETL, AIrflow for orchestration, Redshift for DWH, Superset for BI. We explore data both from online services and brick-and-mortar clinics to boost the effectiveness of just any business process.

We want you to help us build a true data-driven company combining your cutting edge analytical skills with our modern medical technologies.

Why we’re cool:

  • Remote work or relocation in sunny Barcelona. Some of us prefer to work together in our Barcelona office and others prefer remote. For us, there’s no difference as long as you have an excellent internet connection;

  • Highly skilled development team who stand for quality code. After having built many products in the past, we started Impress using serverless and a scalable infrastructure from day 1 to allow for faster development; We like functional and reactive functional programming paradigms.

  • Highly experienced business and marketing team (Airbnb, Uber);

  • A new project, no legacy;

  • No time tracking. Flexible schedule, the main thing is the result;

  • We are ready to meet you and discuss your money expectations =)

Necessary skills:

  • Python proficiency. Ability to serve clear production code with focus on data.
  • Close relations with Airflow, Airbyte, DBT. Knowledge of their strong sides and pitfalls. Ability to combine multiple instruments into a reliable pipeline
  • SQL proficiency. Knowledge of OLAP databases such as Redshift, Greenplum, Clickhouse and how to maintain them. Knowledge of DWH modelling approaches.
  • B+ English

Amazing if:

  • Deep knowledge with AWS stack: EC2, Redshift, Kinesis.
  • Knowledge of Data Governance instruments and solutions
  • Ability to build BI dashboards - we use Apache Superset

About the job:

  • Maintain data pipelines in order;

  • Serve datamarts for users: BI dashboards, analysts, data scientists;

  • Building and maintaining dashboards;

  • Explore data and generating actionable insights;

  • Conducting AB-tests both online and offline - on clinics and cities level.

Join our talent international team and let's Impress everyone)
